com.vmware.vapi.saml

Interface XmlParserFactory


  • public interface XmlParserFactory
    Simplified version of DocumentBuilderFactory designed for use for SAML token parsing.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  XmlParserFactory.Factory
      Factory for different flavor XML parsers.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DocumentBuilder newDocumentBuilder()
      Creates a document builder with configuration acceptable only for securely parsing SAML tokens and related XML contexts.

    • Method Detail

      • newDocumentBuilder

        DocumentBuilder newDocumentBuilder()
                                   throws ParserConfigurationException
        Creates a document builder with configuration acceptable only for securely parsing SAML tokens and related XML contexts. Do not use as a general XML parser.
        Returns:
        a new document builder suitable for secure SAML token parsing, not null
        Throws:
        ParserConfigurationException
